lead_paragraph: PIERMONT--Donald K.,92, of Fair Lawn, NJ passed on Tuesday, January 19, 2016 at home with his loving wife by his side. Born and raised in New York, he resided in Venice, FL for 27 years before returning to Fair Lawn where he had lived for many years. An avid golfer, he served as an officer of the Preakness Hills Country Club in Wayne. A very charitable man especially to the military, Humane Society and American Cancer Society, Don was a loyal and knowledgeable New York Yankees fan, and enjoyed travelling and time spent at the beach. Prior to retiring in 1988, he owned and operated Dave Stern Tires in Paterson and Morristown for 43 years. Beloved husband of Barbara (Stern) Piermont. Loving and devoted father of Donald Piermont, Jr. and wife Barbara, Jack Piermont and wife Marilyn and Sally Gillenson and husband Josh. Cherished grandfather of six and great grandfather of four. The family will receive relatives and friends Thursday, 7-9pm at Vander Plaat-Caggiano Funeral Home, 13-31 Saddle River Road, Fair Lawn, NJ, 201-797-3500. A Funeral Mass is planned for Friday, January 22, 2016, 10:30am at St. Anne R.C. Church, 15-05 St. Anne Street, Fair Lawn, NJ. Entombment will follow at Holy Sepulchre Cemetery in Totowa, NJ. In lieu of flowers, donations to a charity of choice would be appreciated. For additional information, please visit www.vpfairlawn.com. 1/3
